ctx: apply Rbar_is_glb_subset with (E1 := fun x => exists n, x = u n) (E2 := fun x => exists n, x = v n).
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "v n" in the current goal.

ctx: apply Rbar_is_glb_subset with (E1 := fun x => exists n, x = u n) (E2 := fun x => exists n, x = v n).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. pose (H2' := is_inf_seq_glb _ _ H2). pose (H3' := is_inf_seq_glb _ _ H3). apply Rbar_is_glb_subset with (E1 := fun x => exists n, x = u n) (E2 := fun x => exists n, x = v n). - intros x [n Hn]. exists n. now rewrite <- Hn. - apply H2'. - apply H3'.
